mean_cn: n.罩衫，工装服；  adj.全面的，全部的
mean_en: a pair of pants with an extra piece attached that covers the chest and has straps that go over the shoulders
sentence: In old factory photos, all the steel workers wore overalls.
sentence_trans: 在旧工厂照片里，所有的钢铁工人都穿着工装服。
word_etyma: over覆盖 + all全部 → 覆盖全部 → overall全部的，全面的
